cn.sharesdk.framework

类 Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.framework.Service

  • public abstract class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    Service is a kind of plag-in in ShareSDK. You can use ShareSDK.registerService(Class) to register a new service into ShareSDK, use ShareSDK.getService(Class) to get an instance of your service, and use ShareSDK.unregisterService(Class) to unregister it.

      java.lang.String getDeviceKey() 
      abstract java.lang.String getServiceVersionName()
      returns the string type of the version, like: 1.0.0
      void onBind()
      called after service is binded into ShareSDK
      void onUnbind()
      called before setvice is unbinded out of ShareSDK
